sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import com_logo_4 from "../img/com-logo-4.jpg"; import { jobs } from '../data'; import { Store } from '../Store'; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; export default function JobDetails() { const {state} = useContext(Store); const {user} = state; const navigate = useNavigate(); const params = useParams(); const {id} = params; const handleClick = () =>{ if(!user){ navigate('/loginuser') }else{ //perform application operation navigate('/success') } } return (

Job Detail

  1. Home
  2. Pages
  3. Job Detail
{jobs .filter((item) => item.id === Number(id)) .map((value, key) => (

{value.title}

{value.location} {value.nature} {value.salary}

Job description

{value.description}

Responsibility

{value.position}

Qualifications

{value.qualification}

Apply For The Job

Job Summary

Published On: {value.publish}

Vacancy: {value.vacant} Position

Job Nature: {value.nature}

Salary: {value.salary}

Location: {value.location}

Country: {value.country}

Date Line: {value.dateline}

Company Detail

{value.companyInfo}

))}
); }
